document.full_text: the nasdaq jumped to a 10-year high as u.s. stocks rallied on wednesday after fed chairman ben bernanke's first-ever press conference did nothing to short-circuit investors' optimistic outlook on the economy.
document.title: nasdaq ends at 10-year high in bernanke-driven rally
lines_and_colors: the nasdaq jumped to a 10-year high as u.s. stocks rallied on wednesday after fed chairman ben bernanke's first-ever press conference did nothing to short-circuit investors' optimistic outlook on the economy.
